about_the_game:
This pack includes:

  • "Bram van Helsing" hero unlock;
  • "Vampire Hunter" outfit;
  • "Aspen stake" weapon;
  • 700 Crowns.

Bram van Helsing is a rich Dutch aristocrat, but he is not a simple bohemian rake, but a hematophagus, “a real vampire”. Thanks to black magic, he mastered the ability to turn into a flock of bats.

Ability: "Flock of bats"
Allows you to levitate and move quickly in the form of bats. Levitating the character gives “vampirism”: – 50% of the damage done to the enemy is returned in the form of health. Acceleration allows you to turn into a flock of bats and move at high speed. In this state, damage is reduced by 50%, and during the "Sun Eclipse" ritual by 70%. Be careful! The "Killing Sun" ritual will do increased damage.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.
detailed_description:
This pack includes:

  • "Bram van Helsing" hero unlock;
  • "Vampire Hunter" outfit;
  • "Aspen stake" weapon;
  • 700 Crowns.

Bram van Helsing is a rich Dutch aristocrat, but he is not a simple bohemian rake, but a hematophagus, “a real vampire”. Thanks to black magic, he mastered the ability to turn into a flock of bats.

Ability: "Flock of bats"
Allows you to levitate and move quickly in the form of bats. Levitating the character gives “vampirism”: – 50% of the damage done to the enemy is returned in the form of health. Acceleration allows you to turn into a flock of bats and move at high speed. In this state, damage is reduced by 50%, and during the "Sun Eclipse" ritual by 70%. Be careful! The "Killing Sun" ritual will do increased damage.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
